meanings.definition: a unit of currency in Nepal
meanings.sent1: In Nepal, you can buy many things with just a few paras.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for paras when I visited Nepal.
meanings.sent3: Why did the paras refuse to play with the rupees? Because they were too small!
meanings.sent4: The value of a paras in Nepal is like finding a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The colorful paras jingled in my pocket as I walked through the market.

meanings.definition: a small, flat, disc-shaped object used in games
meanings.sent1: The children played with paras in the park all afternoon.
meanings.sent2: I found a shiny paras under the couch while cleaning.
meanings.sent3: Why did the paras roll away from the other toys? It wanted to be the disc of attention!
meanings.sent4: The paras spun through the air like a flying saucer.
meanings.sent5: The paras landed perfectly in the target, earning a high score in the game.

meanings.definition: a type of plant that grows on other plants
meanings.sent1: The paras on the tree trunk added a touch of green to the forest.
meanings.sent2: The paras on the branches provided a home for small insects.
meanings.sent3: Why did the paras blush? Because it saw the mistletoe!
meanings.sent4: The paras intertwined with the host plant, creating a beautiful symbiotic relationship.
meanings.sent5: The paras swayed gently in the breeze, enjoying the sunlight filtering through the leaves.

meanings.definition: a prefix meaning beside or alongside
meanings.sent1: The parasocial relationships formed online can feel real to some people.
meanings.sent2: The parasitism between the two characters in the story was evident.
meanings.sent3: Why did the parasailing instructor always have great stories? Because he lived life beside the clouds!
meanings.sent4: The friendship between them was like a parasol, providing shade and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The collaboration between the two artists was a masterpiece, working paras to create something beautiful.
